name: Avocado Pit
description:
play the game on scratch at 

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/528528959/

Instruction

Move with: WASD/Arrow Keys

Shoot/aim with the mouse

Story

You once the food king every one loved you till the evil foods came Apples, carrots, and pineapples your goal is to destroy the other foods so you can become king again

there are 16 Levels 

3 food (Apple, Carrot, and Pineapple)

Avocado Pit Gold is a 2$ Skin pack for Avocado Pit it is also a separate game file !NOT A MOD PACK!
